Summary: night - flashing red, blue and green
divs: Sighting DetailsThe first time I noticed it, it came from the ssw, moved very slowly for 2 hours. Ocassionally in moved slightly up and down. Continued until it was in the west south west. Beyound that would be behind my home. It was at about 45 degrees above the ground. The center of the luminous was a darker circle. Today is March 7th. I have seen the same movement fot 7 nights in a row. I expect it to come tonight. I took a photo.
